response.overview: After George losses everything he blames God. He lost his best friend, and his wife. George is mad at the world and everything in it especially God for allowing this to happen. Then George turns to alcohol to drown his troubles and in the process, he pushes everyone close to him away, until Kate moves in next door. As millions of people around the world prepare to watch the eclipse, they are unaware that something else is about to take place. Will George forgive God and become friends with Kate, or will he continue to fight God and be left behind when the rapture occurs?
response.title: The Last Passage
